item.title: Kogama: Plants Vs Zombie
item.description: Launching the game Plants vs Zombies Garden Warfare will introduce you to Dave the weirdo who survived the zombie apocalypse. Now you need to help him cope with the onslaught of monsters that keep coming and going to fresh blood. You also need to attack them with the help of existing plants in order to avoid the destruction of the fortification on the rock. The game consists of a huge number of levels, and each one has new types of zombies with special characteristics.
